creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: 8" wide band has overall floral emboridery of red, green, blue on white; gold tassels 4 1/2" at band bottom; black velveteen band on 3 sides with pink and green embroidered borders; black lining; ties are printed bloral fabric in multi colors
title: Baby Carrier
